message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I think it would be very valuable to you, and this is a fair price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $13,000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $13,500.  Would that work for you?
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I can only agree to a price of $13,200 for the product. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.
